data.title: Great spot to stop in, not far from freeway too! Reasonable prices..
data.text: Stopped in after work with the "girls" for a much needed drink on a Weds. Though we got there at only 5 minutes to six and ordered well after, I was still given the "happy hour" prices to my surprise. I had a Pineapple Sculpin to start and it was too "hoppy" for my taste and passed it to my friend then ordered Orange Hefe, yeah I'm a wuss when it comes to the hops. I ordered the prime rib sliders and onion rings which were surprisingly made from red onions...and it was all tasty. The sliders were really a sandwich or dip that is cut into 4 and came with some of their homemade chips...again surprised because I didn't notice the menu saying that. Their homemade chips aren't like any other I have had, super thin and seasoned rather than thick and oily with just salt. My friends had pizzas and I was too into my meal to try theirs but they assure me it was delicious. When I asked if it would be too much trouble for separate checks, our server didn't bat a lash and said no problem at all.

data.title: Great Hidden Gem
data.text: This place is just what we needed on Main Street! They have great appetizers and salads and my kids love the burgers! Nice selection of craft brews. Casual and good for the whole family.

data.title: wonderful addition to downtown
data.text: Large portions incredible food. Texas eggrolls, prime rib sliders and fish and chips all excellent will be back for more

data.title: Great food.
data.text: The wait staff know the beers and food. If you ask them, they will tell you what they like. I had waffles and chicken, but the salmon looked excellent, too! If you are in Lake Elsinore, stop by for good food. The place has a sports bar feel, so be prepared for a little noise. When I was there, the staff quickly reduced the volume of the music when requested.  You won't be disappointed!

data.title: Selection and Local Flavor
data.text: Great new find. I have only been here once, but I will be back.  I had the chicken and waffles (great), but next time it will be the salmon. Great selection of beers.  Loved the old town charm. Wait staff is very attentive and personable.
